content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Answer all parts of the question that follows.a) Identify ONE innovation in commercial practices in the period circa 1450–1750.b) Explain ONE way in which new commercial practices affected interactions between world regions in the period circa 1450–1750.c) Explain ONE way in which new commercial practices affected economic interactions between European nations in the period circa 1450–1750.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
